name: Moonshot... golfing?
description:
Moonshot... golfing?

Demons have been planning an attack against the humans for a while now. Experts determined that a humble golf dad was the chosen saviour, despite never before being trained in combat. You must do the impossible and use your golfing skills to make your way through demon territory to defeat their leader and save the world. 

Combat & General Controls
  • WASD or arrow keys - Move
  • SPACE - Skip next level panning
  • LMB - Melee
  • RMB (hold to determine power, release to shoot) - Ranged attack
  • Q , mouse over enemies - Multi-target special
Golfing Controls
  • TAB - Aerial view
  • E, then LMB -  Aim and shoot golf ball

This game was made in 1 month for Game Off 2020.

NOTE: This is just a quick build with some placeholders for playtesting basic mechanics. The full game will be uploaded Tuesday. For now, the game will need to be fullscreened to display correctly.
